mapper.select: SELECT ipo.ipo_index, stock_name, stock_kinds, stock_exchange, DATE_FORMAT(ipo_start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_start_date, DATE_FORMAT(ipo_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_end_date, DATE_FORMAT(ipo_refund_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_refund_date, DATE_FORMAT(ipo_debut_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_debut_date, under.underwriter, tag FROM ipo LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT iu.ipo_index, GROUP_CONCAT(iu.under_name SEPARATOR ',') AS underwriter FROM (SELECT ipo_underwriter.ipo_index, ipo_underwriter.under_name, ipo_underwriter.ind_total_max FROM ipo_underwriter) AS iu GROUP BY iu.ipo_index) AS under ON ipo.ipo_index = under.ipo_index ORDER BY ipo.ipo_index DESC LIMIT 100;

SELECT ipo_index, stock_name, stock_exchange, stock_kinds, stock_code, dart_code, sector_code.sector_desc AS sector, profits, sales,
DATE_FORMAT(ipo_forecast_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_forecast_date, DATE_FORMAT(ipo_start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_start_date, DATE_FORMAT(ipo_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_end_date, DATE_FORMAT(ipo_refund_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_refund_date, DATE_FORMAT(ipo_debut_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_debut_date,
lock_up_percent, ipo_institutional_acceptance_rate, ipo_price, ipo_price_low, ipo_price_high, ipo_min_deposit,
underwriter, put_back_option_who, put_back_option_price, put_back_option_deadline, tag, DATE_FORMAT(regist_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') regist_date, DATE_FORMAT(update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') update_date FROM ipo LEFT OUTER JOIN sector_code ON ipo.sector = sector_code.sector_code WHERE ipo_index = #{ipoIndex}

SELECT ipo_index, stock_name, date_format(ipo_forecast_date,'%Y-%m-%d') ipo_forecast_date, date_format(ipo_start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_start_date, date_format(ipo_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_end_date, date_format(ipo_refund_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_refund_date, date_format(ipo_debut_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_debut_date FROM ipo WHERE (ipo_forecast_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) OR (ipo_start_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) OR (ipo_end_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) OR (ipo_refund_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) OR (ipo_debut_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})

SELECT ipo_comment.comment_index, ipo_comment.ipo_index, ipo.stock_name, ipo_comment.comment, ipo_comment.writer, date_format(ipo_comment.regist_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') regist_date FROM ipo_comment LEFT JOIN ipo ON ipo_comment.ipo_index = ipo.ipo_index ORDER BY comment_index DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};
SELECT comment_index, ipo_index, comment, writer, DATE_FORMAT(regist_date, '%Y-%m-%d') regist_date FROM ipo_comment WHERE ipo_index = #{ipoIndex} ORDER BY comment_index DESC
SELECT ipo_index, DATE_FORMAT(regist_date, '%Y-%m-%d') update_date, under_name, ind_total_max, ind_total_min, ind_can_max, ind_can_min FROM ipo_underwriter WHERE ipo_index = #{ipoIndex}
